Text:
Tonight, the Senate voted to avoid default and begin to curb Washington Democrats' addiction to reckless spending. Four months after @SpeakerMcCarthy invited @POTUS to begin negotiations, an important step toward fiscal sanity will finally become law.

Full statement: https://t.co/hkoFvHUvKv

.@POTUS' student loan socialism would shift hundreds of billions of dollars in debt from high earners who chose to incur it onto American taxpayers who did not. But thanks to the leadership of @SenBillCassidy, @JohnCornyn, and @SenJoniErnst, the Senate has a chance to stop this.

House Republicans’ unity forced @POTUS to negotiate with @SpeakerMcCarthy and agree to cut government spending. Tonight’s passage of the Fiscal Responsibility Act is an important step in the right direction. Now, it’s the Senate’s turn to pass this agreement without delay.

.@SpeakerMcCarthy and House Republicans secured a crucial first step toward bringing Washington Democrats’ reckless spending to heel. Their unity forced President Biden to do his job. And soon, it will be the Senate’s turn to pass this important agreement.

On Memorial Day, we honor the brave servicemen and women who laid down their lives for our country. Today and every day, let us honor the sacrifices so many heroes have made in preservation of our freedom.

Today’s agreement ensures that a debt limit increase comes with serious steps to rein in Washington Democrats’ addiction to reckless spending. The Senate must act swiftly and pass this agreement without unnecessary delay.

Full statement: https://t.co/Kkh2VpeSIZ

The Supreme Court’s decision in Sackett v. EPA provides long-awaited relief and much-needed clarity for millions of small businesses and landowners on the limits of the federal government’s WOTUS regulations.

Full statement: https://t.co/HHP17NN4on

.@POTUS waited months before agreeing to negotiate with @SpeakerMcCarthy on a spending deal. They are the only two who can reach an agreement. It is past time for the White House to get serious. Time is of the essence.

As @POTUS meets in Japan with our strongest economic partners, I hope he will build on the West’s support for Ukraine by clearing the way for the transfer of critical weapons. We must move at the speed of relevance to help them liberate their territory from Russian occupation.

As our nation's capital continues to grapple with a rising tide of violent crime, the left-wing D.C. Council wants to make law enforcement’s job even tougher. But this Police Week, the Senate rejected the D.C. Council’s new radical law on a bipartisan basis.

Washington Democrats’ reckless spending and green energy fantasies are sending our economy deep into the red. Since @POTUS took office, prices have climbed a staggering 16%. Americans have had to tighten their belts just to get by. It’s time for this Administration to do the same.

During National Police Week, Senate Democrats want to make an anti-police activist a federal judge. Nancy Abudu’s disregard for the rule of law should be disqualifying for anyone seeking a lifetime appointment to the federal bench.

This week’s G7 meetings are a chance for @POTUS to rally our closest allies with real American leadership – to help Ukraine win, to deter Iran’s violence at home and abroad, and to meet China’s malign influence with united resolve. I hope he will seize this opportunity.

Proud to welcome law enforcement officers and families from KY and across the nation to Washington for National Police Week. Especially on National Peace Officers' Memorial Day, we honor the brave men and women in blue who have laid down their lives to protect our communities.
Happy Mother's Day to all of the amazing mothers in Kentucky and across the country. Thinking especially of my mom Dean today. https://t.co/DoVglRyLI0

.@POTUS’ reckless policies have led to chaos on our southern border. And now the situation is about to get much worse with Title 42 going away. Last year Democrats had a chance to keep Title 42 in place but voted in lock-step against it. The country reaps what Democrats sowed.

The NDAA is must-pass legislation. But Senate Dems are letting our national security languish. Instead, Democrats are making a push for a grab bag of liberal domestic priorities they want to label as another “China bill.” When will they get serious about competing with China?

This latest version of Democrats’ so-called ‘Clean Power Plan’ poses an existential threat to providers of affordable and reliable American energy. Working Americans cannot afford this — and Kentuckians and West Virginians least of all.

Full statement: https://t.co/ZycvrlFGyL

There’s no reason why our country should be drifting towards crisis. The solution is clear: a bipartisan deal between @POTUS and @SpeakerMcCarthy. Just like how seven of the last ten debt limit increases were attached to bipartisan spending deals. It’s up to @POTUS to now negotiate.

It’s with deep sadness that Elaine and I learned of the loss of the great University of Louisville Men’s Basketball coaching legend Denny Crum. We send our deepest sympathies to his wife Susan and all of his friends and family.

Full statement: https://t.co/HkrsjpIbQn

Today, the very best of the Bluegrass is on full display. Our best Thoroughbreds meet under the Twin Spires of Churchill Downs for the 149th Kentucky Derby, the greatest two minutes in sports. I look forward to joining the rest of the country in watching this proud Kentucky tradition.

Democrats talk about infrastructure and competing with China, but they give activists veto power over our ability to make and build things in America. The Empire State Building was built in about a year. Now it can take 4+ years just to get an Environmental Impact Statement.

The Senate's about to vote on two of President Biden's regulations. One holds farmers and ranchers hostage to a bird called the lesser prairie-chicken. The other went soft on China for the sake of the Green New Deal. We need to stand up for working Americans and repeal both.

Democrats want to criticize the House bill, but they have no solution and no plan to prevent a crisis. President Biden has been M.I.A. while our nation drifts toward default on his watch. The President needs to either endorse the House bill or negotiate with @SpeakerMcCarthy now.

.@SpeakerMcCarthy reminded everyone yesterday of his ongoing support for aid to Ukraine. Equipping Ukraine to defend itself is a direct investment in American jobs and our own national security. But at every turn, the Biden Admin has dragged its heels. @POTUS must get serious.

Democrats wants to give lectures about upholding our institutions and protecting democracy. Yet they continue their reckless attacks against our courts. Today's hearing on "Supreme Court Ethics Reform" was just another chapter in their campaign to undermine our federal judiciary.

Janet Mullins Grissom was an incredible friend, an amazing public servant, and a remarkable Kentuckian. I was so lucky to have Janet as my first Senate campaign manager and first chief of staff. 

My full remarks: https://t.co/xjbRRNQqPY

I was honored to welcome President Yoon Suk Yeol of the Republic of Korea to the U.S. Capitol. His visit underscores our nations’ shared commitment to strong democracies, innovative free enterprise economies, and a vital military alliance.

Full Statement: https://t.co/1dbLIyskC5 https://t.co/eO92qKspbe

House Republicans just passed a plan to rein in Democrats' reckless spending. President Biden's last phony excuse for not doing his job has run out. It’s way past time for the President to sit down with Speaker McCarthy and negotiate a bipartisan path forward on the debt ceiling.

I strongly support @SenatorFischer’s resolution to roll back President Biden's radical emissions rules and the Democrats' war on truckers. Families have already been hammered by Democrats' inflation. They can’t afford to wait even longer and pay even more for what they need.

Democrats talk about defending our democracy, but they attack our judiciary and the rule of law. Since character assassination hasn't worked, Senate Democrats are now threatening to de-fund the security for the Justices and their families if SCOTUS doesn’t do what liberals want.

.@POTUS continues to not engage on the debt limit with @SpeakerMcCarthy. A position so absurd even fellow Democrats are not buying it. It’s past time for President Biden to stop the partisan stubbornness, join Speaker McCarthy at the grown-ups’ table, and get talking.

Democrats want to give Washington bureaucrats new power over every ditch and puddle on American farmers’ land. Kentuckians know that’s not commonsense conservation. We have to stand with rural America and stop @POTUS’ power grab.
https://t.co/GUwF51e9JO

President Biden’s nominee to run the Labor Department let billions of dollars in fraud occur on her watch in California. She wants to help Big Labor bosses take money from independent contractors’ paychecks to send to left-wing causes. The Senate should not confirm Julie Su.

The EPA says it will try to slap a radical new mandate on our country regarding electric vehicles. The same Administration that can’t secure our border wants to micromanage Americans’ garages and driveways. Rural America cannot have California liberals dictating what they drive.

House Republicans’ H.R. 1 would be a huge shot in the arm for U.S. energy. But @SenSchumer declared the bill “dead on arrival.” The result is going to be fewer jobs, higher bills, less energy independence, and weaker national security.

Today is Tax Day, and @POTUS wants to make your next one even worse. The Democrats have funneled billions and billions of dollars to the IRS to fund more audits and they want nearly $5 trillion in historic tax hikes.

The polar opposite of what working families need.

President Biden is on the clock to negotiate a bipartisan debt ceiling solution with @SpeakerMcCarthy. The White House cannot ignore reality and declare “no talks, no reforms.” Even Democrats in Congress are calling for compromise. The President has to stop wasting time.
I am looking forward to returning to the Senate on Monday. We've got important business to tackle and big fights to win for Kentuckians and the American people.

Elaine and I are devastated by the news coming out of Louisville this morning. Thank you to LMPD and our first responders for your bravery at the scene. We send our prayers to the victims, their families, and the city of Louisville as we await more information.

.@SenSchumer and I strongly condemn the wrongful detention of U.S. citizen and Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich. We demand the baseless, fabricated charges against Mr. Gershkovich be dropped and he be immediately released.
 
Full statement: https://t.co/ou5EFAhWSV

The Republic of Finland’s accession into NATO is outstanding news that further strengthens what is already the most successful alliance in the history of the human race. I am happy to welcome Finland to the trans-Atlantic Alliance.

Full statement: https://t.co/AM7H0zNYSF

Wednesday's tragic accident at Ft. Campbell reminds us of the daily sacrifice that our Nation’s servicemembers and their families make. Elaine and I join Kentuckians in grieving the loss of these selfless men and women.

Full statement: https://t.co/vijF9U0jXv

H.R. 1 is a bold and comprehensive step toward securing our energy future and helping working families. I applaud our House Republican friends for keeping their promises, standing with the American people, and passing this bill.

Full statement: https://t.co/5yyUrTe3SP

I am devastated to learn about the Army helicopter accident over Kentucky involving our brave 101st Airborne. My team is in contact with the Army and authorities on the ground. Please pray for our servicemembers and their families as we learn more.

President Biden's WOTUS rule is yet another radical power grab. This new regulation would give unelected bureaucrats sweeping control over nearly every piece of Americans’ land that touches a pothole, ditch, or puddle.

My full statement: https://t.co/rrSdePccYt

While Congress debates sunsetting some military authorities in the Middle East, Iran-backed terrorists aren’t sunsetting their war against us.

Pres. Biden must change his failed approach, rebuild deterrence, and protect Americans.

Full statement: https://t.co/RTdLJ9j1Vs

I want to sincerely thank everyone for all the kind wishes. I’m glad to be home and working for Kentuckians and the Republican Conference.
https://t.co/hOs9d1wlM4

President Biden thinks flip-flopping on one D.C. crime bill will stop Democrats' bad press on violent crime. Not a chance. The whole country is suffering, not just Washington — after years of pro-criminal policies and anti-cop rhetoric from federal, state, and local Democrats.

There he goes again. President Biden fearmongering about democracy every time he's facing bad headlines. It's total disinformation. The Georgia law he attacked created record-high turnout, fast lines, and high voter satisfaction including among Black voters.

The White House and House Democrats came out against Republicans overturning D.C.’s soft-on-crime law. Now Dems want to flip-flop. But the record’s clear. Last year every Senate Democrat voted on party lines against using some of their reckless spending spree to combat crime.

Pres. Biden’s mistakes have reduced America's influence and credibility in the Middle East. We must not push away our partners through weakness or blunders. The U.S. will have a weaker, not stronger, hand in Asia if we strategically concede the Middle East to China and Russia.

Elaine and I send our deepest condolences to the grieving families who lost loved ones as a result of the severe weather across Kentucky. We will continue to pray for all of the storm victims and their families and I stand ready to assist with our recovery in the days ahead.

Our country's decline in law and order hasn’t been happenstance. Today’s Democratic Party has made a deliberate decision to make public safety and innocent citizens a lower priority than repeat criminal offenders. The American people want and deserve law and order.

Americans deserve a judiciary made up of the best and brightest. But Democrats' nominees have fewer top clerkships and top academic honors than Republicans’ nominees had. One Biden nominee didn't know Article II of the Constitution. Another attacked a teenage victim’s anonymity.

Democrats want Washington to dictate your childcare choices, your kitchen appliances, your small business decisions, and your local voting laws. But the one thing Congress shouldn't address is runaway violent crime in D.C. itself?

Dems are just trying to duck a debate on crime.

The Biden Administration wants to let money managers use Americans’ retirement savings to push left-wing political causes while decreasing the return on investment for workers. Yet another Democrat attack on families' finances.
 
The Senate's going to vote this week.

I spent last week meeting with America's allies and partners across Europe and the Middle East. Our friends' hunger for American strength and leadership in the world is palpable. And even more important, our own country's core national interests depend on it.

A year into Russia’s escalation in Ukraine, it’s safe to say it has not turned out how Putin thought it would. He thinks he can wear the free world down. Today alongside President Niinistö, we delivered the message that we will continue to support Ukraine. https://t.co/rJP8g24o20

The innocent people of Ukraine have suffered devastating violence and destruction at the hands of Vladimir Putin and his war machine for years. The bloody full-scale escalation that he began one year ago with zero justification is just the latest chapter.
Today, Senate colleagues and I met with PM @netanyahu in Jerusalem. Grateful for our shared commitment to the U.S.-Israel relationship. https://t.co/rEeyWVjG4i
Glad to sit down with President @Isaac_Herzog and discuss the future of the U.S.-Israel partnership. https://t.co/pH99VfjtrN
Shared challenges make America and Israel strong allies — but it's our shared values that make us such strong friends. Glad to be with so many friends in Israel today. https://t.co/UoyGiE01sR
The women and men of the @USAFCENT @380AEW work every day to keep America safe. It was an honor to thank them in person. https://t.co/0l6zfa24Zg
The Abrahamic Family House is a powerful symbol of the strength of the Abraham Accords. Proud to advance U.S.-Emirati relations with @SenateGOP colleagues this week. https://t.co/59nt9jYRyT
An honor to meet the Marines stationed at @USAinKSA. Grateful to them and all those who have volunteered to serve our nation in uniform. https://t.co/NAKyio8JvJ
Proud to take the case for an even stronger trans-Atlantic alliance directly to our allies today @MunSecConf. My full remarks: https://t.co/CEwSwoMmnZ
Glad to meet today with German Chancellor @OlafScholz. We’re in a critical moment for American and European commitments to our militaries and our collective defense. https://t.co/r8wPe0dCP5
Tune in now: I’m joining @AmericaNewsroom on @FoxNews to discuss the war in Ukraine, China’s spy balloons, and how President Biden’s foreign policy is falling short.

Russia's brutal aggression has brought @NATO even closer together. Our allies are deepening their commitments to collective defense. Glad to meet with Secretary General @jensstoltenberg today and discuss the future of the strongest military alliance the world has ever known. https://t.co/ClgZnuYadF

America’s youngest governor @SarahHuckabee is right: Two years of total Democrat control in Washington made America weaker. But Republicans at every level of government are fighting for families and holding President Biden and his party accountable.
Tune in: I’m joining @MarthaMaccallum on @FoxNews to discuss President Biden’s belated response to China’s balloon intrusion and take stock of the failures of his first two years in office.
Tune in: I’m joining the @GuyBensonShow on @FoxNewsRadio to discuss how two years of mistakes from President Biden’s Administration have hurt American families.

The world is grieving with the people of Turkey and Syria following this devastating earthquake. Praying for all who are mourning and working to rescue survivors. We stand with our NATO ally Turkey and with the Syrian people who already suffer daily under the Assad regime.

Whether it’s spy balloons or spy satellites, China’s military modernization effort is no joke. I hope President Biden’s belated decision to finally do the right thing carries over into a more serious approach to America’s top adversary. My full statement: https://t.co/fli9tLbe5v

Americans deserve better than runaway inflation, surging crime, open borders, and failing schools. I'm excited the nation will hear from Gov. Sanders after the State of the Union on Tuesday. A sharp contrast with this exhausted, failing Administration. https://t.co/vhAr3fvbrA

Is this the caliber of legal expert with which President Biden is filling the federal bench? For lifetime appointments?

The American people deserve the best and brightest.

Glad the Biden Administration and our European allies have heeded Republicans’ calls to commit battle tanks to Ukraine’s fight to push back Russia’s invasion. Crucial next step is to quickly expand and improve our underlying defense industrial capabilities.

Radical woke prosecutors, runaway city councils — Democrats’ answer to a violent crime wave is to go even softer on criminals.

Let's be clear. Drugs belong off our streets. Career criminals belong behind bars. And politicians who put innocent citizens last belong out of office.

Proud of the Kentuckians and all Americans standing up for human dignity at this year’s March for Life. I’m honored to stand together with you today and everyday in solidarity with the most vulnerable in our society.

We stand with the people of Ukraine grieving the loss of their Interior Minister and all those killed in the tragic helicopter crash. I know their commitment to the defense of their country and its freedom and sovereignty will live on as Ukraine keeps up its brave fight.

Today we honor an American hero, the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. His dream of equal justice and abundant opportunity inspired our nation to make historic progress and continues to make us better to this day.

I am thrilled that Nebraska’s outstanding former Governor Pete Ricketts will be joining us in the Senate. He’ll be a powerhouse addition to our Republican Conference. I look forward to working closely with Pete for years to come.

My full statement: https://t.co/oqgfSea3bv

Congratulations to Speaker McCarthy and the Republican House majority. Senate Republicans look forward to working together to check and balance Washington Democrats, bring oversight to this reckless Administration, fight the far left’s radical policies, and defend America.
Saddened to hear of the passing of Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI, a brilliant scholar and leading light for Catholics the world over. May he rest in peace.

Appalling and illegitimate verdict from an illegitimate sham trial. Burma’s long-suffering people deserve a return to democracy and an end to the Tatmadaw’s brutal tyranny. The Biden Administration and Burma’s neighbors need to keep dialing up the pressure on the junta.

I hope this holiday season brings everyone a chance for prayer and family time. Today, I’m thinking especially of the brave servicemembers and Kentuckians in uniform who are giving up time with their families to keep the rest of us safe. Merry Christmas. https://t.co/09akJ1gBFZ
Continuing our support for Ukraine is morally right, but it is not only that. It is also a direct investment in cold, hard, American interests. https://t.co/zlWoAVz3Kk

The Biden Administration’s COVID-19 vaccine mandate for our military has hurt readiness and retention. Big win for Senator @MarshaBlackburn, Senate Republicans, and most importantly for the men and women who bravely serve our nation in uniform.

To avoid another December 7th or September 11th, Congress must keep focus on defending America, projecting power, and modernizing our military. The strong bipartisan NDAA named for @JimInhofe is a crucial first step. But our work's not finished. https://t.co/ET8Gdtj3JW
Homicides and violent crime are exploding. And what are Washington Democrats doing, just this week? Talking about new proposals to defund police departments.
Since President Biden took office, prices have soared by 13.9%. Democrats’ reckless spending has pushed inflation to its highest level since the fallout from the Carter Administration.

Today, families and friends gather to give thanks for the blessings we share as Americans. I'm especially grateful to the men and women in uniform serving away from home to protect and ensure these blessings. I wish you and your family a very Happy Thanksgiving. https://t.co/EAnXHDCfzk

I’m proud of Senators Thune, Barrasso, Ernst, Capito, and Daines, who were elected to take on critical responsibilities in our Republican Conference. It is the honor of a lifetime to serve alongside my distinguished colleagues as Senate Republican Leader. https://t.co/zZQzQFlhRB

I'm honored that my Republican colleagues have reelected me to lead our outstanding Conference. Our united team is full of energy and ideas. We're going to fight Democrats’ recklessness & promote our commonsense conservative vision to improve families' lives & strengthen America.

Over the past 246 years, millions of brave Americans have joined the ranks of our Armed Forces and sworn to support and defend the Constitution of the United States. Today, to everyone who has served our nation in uniform: thank you, and Happy Veterans Day. https://t.co/k0kQhb193b

President Biden is desperate to change the subject from inflation, crime, and open borders. Now he's claiming that democracy only works if his party wins.

What nonsense. Americans aren't buying it.

Ask how the last two years have affected your family, and then get out and vote!

Elaine and I are terribly saddened by the passing of our dear friend Honey Alexander. I know the entire Senate joins us in praying for her husband Lamar and the entire Alexander family as they hold tight to cherished memories of Honey in this difficult time. My full statement: https://t.co/VStKPuDUFP

Horrified and disgusted by the reports that Paul Pelosi was assaulted in his and Speaker Pelosi's home last night. Grateful to hear that Paul is on track to make a full recovery and that law enforcement including our stellar Capitol Police are on the case.

Democrats have produced staggering 13.5% inflation since President Biden took office. They’ve proven that as long as they have one-party control, they will keep running our economy into the ground. My full statement: https://t.co/cv9KGJ4Rqo

I was deeply saddened to learn this evening that the great Judge Laurence Silberman has passed away. Elaine’s and my prayers tonight are with all the family and friends Larry leaves behind. My full statement: https://t.co/EQpp2c9djV

Democrats wanted one-party control of Washington. They got it. And they used that power to create an economic nightmare for families. Nearly $3 trillion of party-line waste. 13.2% inflation and counting since 2021. A disaster for workers, families, and fixed-income households.

Liberal regulations and red tape make it way too hard to build things, create jobs, and unleash American energy. That’s why Republicans lead on this issue. 

Democrats’ phony fig leaf bill is not real "permitting reform" at all. It would actually make the problem even worse.

.@GOPLeader and @HouseGOP will bring the people’s priorities back into the people’s House.
 
Less inflation. More law and order. Parents' rights. Border security. American energy.

Imagine — a House that actually fights for American families instead of making their lives harder.

Democrats’ failed policies have unleashed a record-breaking illegal immigration crisis. Our southern border is functionally open. It's not fair, it’s not compassionate to anybody, and it’s not sustainable. https://t.co/ZyLJuXE8Rc

Senate Democrats just blocked our bill that would have given railway workers a big raise and prevented a crippling strike and supply chain crisis.

If a strike occurs and paralyzes food, fertilizer, and energy shipments nationwide, it will be because Democrats blocked this bill.

Republicans are heading to the floor with a bill to prevent a railway strike that would create total chaos. It would give workers the package that most of the unions have already approved.

President Biden should have already resolved this himself. Democrats must let this pass.
Stable prices. Secure borders. Basic public safety. Some of the most basic things any government owes its citizens. The bare minimum. And Democrats can’t deliver them.
I am very sorry to learn of the passing of my friend Judge Ken Starr. He was a brilliant litigator, an impressive leader, and a devoted patriot. https://t.co/Fe440IIddB

You can’t make it up: Hours after this terrible inflation report, the White House is hosting an “inflation reduction” celebration. Democrats have spent our economy into disaster and now they’re partying while families pay. They could not look more out of touch if they tried.

Yet another monthly inflation report worse than expectations. Worst food and electricity inflation in more than 40 years. Housing and medical costs way up. Democrats’ reckless policies have waged war on working families’ stability, savings, and lifestyles.

Twenty-one years ago, terrorists changed the course of our history forever. But the American values they tried to smash endured. The American spirit they tried to break only grew stronger. Today let us recommit once more: Never again. https://t.co/wgZiBxYf7a

Today all Americans stand with our great friends across the Atlantic in mourning the monumental loss of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II. Elaine and I extend our deepest sympathies to the Royal Family and to the people of the United Kingdom and the Commonwealth. https://t.co/gtEoyH4GWj

Democrats' student loan socialism is a slap in the face to working Americans who sacrificed to pay their debt or made different career choices to avoid debt. A wildly unfair redistribution of wealth toward higher-earning people. https://t.co/ntyOafgklh

Democrats robbed Americans last year by spending our economy into record inflation. This year, their solution is to do it a second time. The partisan bill President Biden signed into law today means higher taxes, higher energy bills, and aggressive IRS audits.

During my trip to Eastern KY, flood victims told me they are frustrated with FEMA’s confusing disaster aid approval process. I spoke with Director Criswell to ask that FEMA streamline assistance and will closely monitor the situation to ensure this new process is more effective.
Only these reckless Washington Democrats could see another month of 8.5% inflation crushing American families and try to spin it as a win for themselves. My full statement: https://t.co/B3tn6wqptt

Americans’ priorities are crystal clear: Inflation, the economy, crime, and the border. But not one Senate Democrat would agree to take one dime out of their Green New Deal nonsense to cut inflation, fight crime, or secure the border. https://t.co/wLOdfpTEd8

Democrats have proven over and over they simply do not care about middle-class families’ priorities. Only 18% of Americans are happy with this Democrat-run economy.
 
And they just spent hundreds of billions of dollars more of your money to prove it yet again. My full statement: https://t.co/uWA8VCbq7i

There is no working family in America whose top priorities are doubling the size of the IRS and giving rich people money to buy $80,000 electric cars. Americans want Washington to address inflation, crime, and the border — not another reckless liberal taxing and spending spree.
Tune in now to @FoxNews. I’m joining @BretBaier to discuss Finland and Sweden joining NATO and Democrats’ attempts to pass huge, job-killing tax hikes in the middle of a recession they created.
I’m about to join the @GuyBensonShow to discuss Democrats' reckless taxing and spending spree, strengthening NATO, and supporting Taiwan. Listen here: https://t.co/HC2JtVXHgB

Democrats want to raise families’ electricity, gas, and heating bills so they can send rich people rebates for buying $80,000 electric cars. New taxes on American oil and gas.

Costly virtue signaling with no meaningful emissions impact as China keeps emitting more and more.

Even the Democrats’ favorite estimate says their so-called inflation bill will take nine years to cut the same amount of inflation that our country added every week in June. 

Nine years of huge tax hikes and big spending to remove literally one week's worth of inflation. A joke.

Thank you to the @kentuckyguard for your extraordinary work to save flood victims in Eastern Kentucky. You’ve been on the ground and in the air since the outset of this emergency, performing daring rescues and rendering aid. I am profoundly grateful for your service to our state.

The world is a better, safer place without the al Qaeda terrorist Ayman al-Zawahiri. I am profoundly grateful to the intelligence and counterterrorism professionals who spent decades hunting this terrorist killer. My full statement: https://t.co/QPPOz89jCq

In the middle of a recession, Democrats want to raise taxes, kill jobs, and attack American energy. All of this economic genius is brought to you by the same people that said a $1.9 trillion spending spree would not cause inflation right before it did.

Governor Beshear has confirmed that 35 Kentuckians lost their lives amid flash floods. Sadly, I’m told that number will rise. Unthinkable stories continue to come to us out of Eastern Kentucky. I will continue to work closely with local and state leaders to offer further support.

My heart breaks for the Kentucky families mourning the loss of loved ones as flooding continues. Thank you to all first responders working to prevent further tragedy. I'm monitoring this situation and working with federal, state, and local officials to assist in any way possible.

Thank you @POTUS for rapidly declaring a Major Disaster in response to Eastern Kentucky’s ongoing flooding. I joined all members of our congressional delegation to support @GovAndyBeshear’s request and speed federal resources to assist search and rescue operations.

My prayers are with the families in Eastern Kentucky facing heavy floods, mudslides, and power outages this week. My team is in close contact with local officials and I’m ready to provide any help I can. Thank you to the first responders who are helping Kentuckians stay safe.

Democrats have already crushed American families with historic inflation.
 
Now they want to pile on giant tax hikes that will hammer workers and kill many thousands of American jobs.
 
First they killed your family's budget. Now they want to kill your job too.

Tune in now to @FoxBusiness. I am joining Larry Kudlow to discuss the pain Democrats' reckless agenda is causing the American people and the importance of strengthening NATO by welcoming Sweden and Finland.

You’d think the worst inflation in 40 years would be enough to convince Democrats to change course. Instead, the same people who spent us into inflation want to tax us into recession. Massive new tax hikes at a time when families are struggling just to stand still financially.

First Democrats said their reckless spending wouldn’t cause inflation. Then they said it would be transitory. Then they said it had peaked last year.

Now those same Democrats are insisting we aren’t headed into a recession. 

Draw your own conclusions.

Washington Democrats’ one-party government has performed an amazing feat:
 
In eighteen months, they’ve taken an economy that was ready to soar and spent it into inflation. Now, their latest plans are threatening to tax it into recession.
I was sorry to hear that President Biden has tested positive for COVID-19. Wishing him a speedy recovery.

Yesterday, @SenateForeign took an important step toward ratifying Finland and Sweden’s accession to NATO. The Senate must move swiftly to complete its role in this historic process and strengthen the most successful military alliance in the world.

Energy prices are rising faster than at any point since 1980. In the last year, gas prices have risen nearly 60% and natural gas is up nearly 40%.

Democrats have surveyed this scene and decided it’s the perfect time to hike taxes on American energy. What a reckless proposition.

A year ago today, with prices already rising, President Biden said high inflation was, “expected to be temporary.”

Well, last week’s inflation report confirmed on paper what working families have been feeling for a year: President Biden’s prediction was dead wrong.

One clear reason we're suffering from 40-year high inflation: The $1.9 trillion reckless spending this all-Democratic government passed on a party-line basis last year. 

Now, after spending us into inflation, they want to tax us into a recession. https://t.co/B2oZgpOkrE
